Class ColorUtil

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Lets you get dye color by passing ItemStack

      static float[] checkHandReverse(net.minecraft.util.EnumHand hand, float... rgb)
      Used to reverse color for multi-hand render, that means, if passed hand is main, leave all like it was before, otherwise, reverse

      Formats message, replacing &[CC] with color codes

      Gets a Hex integer containing a color for passed stack

      Gets if this stack is a "DyeStack"
      static float[] reverse(float... rgb)
      Inverts ARGB color, passed as a 0-1 float array
